components.cssCode:
@keyframes glitch { 0% { transform: translate(0,0); opacity: 1; } 10% { transform: translate(-2px,2px); opacity: 0.8; } 20% { transform: translate(2px,-2px); opacity: 0.6; } 30% { transform: translate(-1px,1px); opacity: 0.8; } 40% { transform: translate(1px,-1px); opacity: 0.6; } 50% { transform: translate(-2px,2px); opacity: 0.8; } 60% { transform: translate(2px,-2px); opacity: 0.6; } 70% { transform: translate(-1px,1px); opacity: 0.8; } 80% { transform: translate(1px,-1px); opacity: 0.6; } 90% { transform: translate(0,0); opacity: 0.8; } 100% { transform: translate(0,0); opacity: 1; } }
.animate-glitch { animation: glitch 300ms linear; }
